import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../App.css"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import Side_component from "./Auth_components"; import { post } from "../../../server/router/auth"; import auth from 'auth'; const Signup = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: "", email: "", phone: "", age: "", gender: "", uid: "", password: "", c_password: "" }); let name, value const handleInputs = (e) => { console.log(e); name = e.target.name; value = e.target.value; setUser({ ...user, [name]: value }); }; const PostDTATA = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const { name, email, phone, age, gender, uid, password, c_password } = user const response = await fetch("../register", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "Appliation/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ name, email, phone, age, gender, uid, password, c_password }) }) const result = await response.json() if (result.status === 422 || !result) { window.alert("Invalid regidtration") console.Console("Invalid regidtration") } else { window.alert("Successful regidtration") console.Console("Successful registration") } } return (
